data.author: Isaac Johnson

changelog.release_notes: Release 1.1: Fixes: short name on phone, hide meridian when on 24h time, features: included small icon for watchfaces section. new feature: added battery level (just flick your wrist to register a tap and it will display for less than a minute then hide again).
Fleur De Lis v1. A simple but elegant watch face.  It shows Time (including 24h support), date, meridian, temp (in F) weather and wind speed.

data.description: Fleur De Lis is a simple yet elegant watchface featuring the iconic Fleur-de-lis graphic.  It shows 24h and 12h with meridian, date, temp (F), weather and windspeed for your location.

latest_release.release_notes: Release 1.1: Fixes: short name on phone, hide meridian when on 24h time, features: included small icon for watchfaces section. new feature: added battery level (just flick your wrist to register a tap and it will display for less than a minute then hide again).

data.title: FleurDeLis
